Name: ZOLO - Zombies Only Live Once
About the game: “Zolo – Zombies Only Live Once” a Zombie, low poly cubic style, action adventure, PC VR game. You’re an unconventional, love spreading, peacemaking Zombie of the modern times. Living in the capital of the land of traditional fascist zombies. Which means equal rights and freedom of expression are of utmost importance for you and your race and they want none of it. Due to the excessive love you were giving, the mayor decided to cast you away for infecting other zombies with a despicable love emotion, which might result in the return of the human race itself. But after a long time in exile!!! You decided to take revenge on your people by invading Necroville. Feel the brute strength with your fist punches! Experience the fire power with a large arsenal and exotic weapons! Launch your victims into thin air and score higher!
